__e: You are on the verge of a breakthrough, and the biggest mistake that you can make right now is to act as if it's a setback.
No one knows what the Revelation is, and I have no idea what happened to your friend.
But when you left yesterday, I had an epiphany and I heard a voice.
Frankly, I passed most of my life as white... until I had a racial awakening and discovered my Mohonk blood.
And this starts with the biggest admission of my life.
Non-disclosure of evidence is as serious as it gets.
